name: E/M + Minor Procedure Without Modifier 25
description: Established patient visit with cryotherapy, missing modifier 25
clinician_note: Patient: Jane Doe, DOB 03/15/1975. Established patient presented for follow-up of actinic keratosis on forehead. Discussed treatment options. Patient elected cryotherapy. Performed cryotherapy to single lesion on forehead. Tolerated well. Return PRN.
expected_issue: Missing modifier 25 on E/M code when billed with minor procedure

name: Missing Provider NPI
description: Valid claim but missing required NPI number
clinician_note: Patient: Robert Smith, DOB 07/22/1960. New patient presenting with right knee pain for 3 months. Examined knee, ordered x-rays. Discussed treatment plan including physical therapy and NSAIDs. Follow up in 4 weeks.

procedures.description: Office visit, new patient, high complexity

name: MRI Without Prior Authorization
description: MRI brain ordered but missing required prior authorization
clinician_note: Patient: Emily Johnson, DOB 11/08/1982. Patient with persistent headaches and visual disturbances. Neurological exam unremarkable. Ordered MRI brain with and without contrast to rule out intracranial pathology. Patient educated on procedure and follow-up plan.
expected_issue: MRI requires prior authorization which is missing

procedures.description: Office visit, established patient, high complexity
MRI brain with and without contrast
